summary: Consume the Baserow API to perform operations such as creating, deleting, updating, and retrieving rows in a database table.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to operate on (e.g., Row).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Create, Delete, Get, Get Many, Update).

parameters.name: database name or id
parameters.description: Select or specify the ID of the database to operate on.

parameters.name: table name or id
parameters.description: Select or specify the ID of the table to operate on, dependent on the chosen database.

parameters.name: row id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the row to retrieve or update.

parameters.name: data to send
parameters.description: Choose how to handle input data for creating or updating rows.

parameters.name: inputs to ignore
parameters.description: Specify input properties to exclude when sending data.

parameters.name: fields to send
parameters.description: Specify the field values to send for creating or updating rows.
